title: Level 2 here, but have been level 30 for over a year.
body: I cant comment anywhere but here? Whats the deal?

replies.body: Well, I guess making this post fixed it in my profile, but I still cant post anywhere it says I need to be level 7.
Are you still have any issues posting?  You may need to relog just to be sure.  Sometimes an account needs to sync to the boards and show the correct level.  Let me know!
